default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I can smell many interesting "scents" around here. Hmm... Maybe I can make a few really extraordinary perfumes out of them.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I smell a richer aroma...

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I love to capture all fragrances, and then... keep them forever.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: The smell here is... suffocating.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: The scent lasted quite a while this time.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I despise the stench of blood...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Indulge in this fragrance forever!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: The scent... has dispersed...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Whenever my restless emotions are soothed, I know... it's because you have come to me...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Grey amber, iris root... these are all excellent ingredients, but they don't meet my standards. They always have a lingering, unpleasant odor... I need something more pure, more vivid...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: There must be a never-fading "immortal fragrance" in this world. It's just that I haven't found the right ingredients to create it yet...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Naturally, rich perfumes must be stored in exquisite glass bottles. They need to be delicate, transparent, and sealed so that not a whiff leaks out... I've collected many, and there must be one that's good to put you in.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Only fragrances made from life can completely mask the scent of decay. Perhaps it's the complexity of the soul and memory that brings a more layered aroma... Humans are truly fascinating.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I like to handle the ingredients myself. When I strip away those ivory-colored chunks and feel the warm fluids flow through my fingers, inspiration for the fragrance will gush incessantly into my mind... Oh, how I love this feeling.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Typically, beauty is a notable characteristic of top-tier ingredients, hence I love approaching beautiful bodies. However, sometimes I find unexpected delights with other characteristics, like you... You have a fragrance that drives one mad.

default.title: Compliance
default.text: I already know what kind of perfume I will make you into... Something light, clear, and with a soft warmth... topped with a sharp finish. Such a special fragrance will surely dispel all nightmares and fears. If I could keep your scent on me forever, then perhaps my heart could achieve complete tranquility.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Moments of leisure and comfort... are best to enjoy a hint of fresh green notes.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Do you like the perfume I have on today, too?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Hmm, you look so intoxicated... What does this scent make you think of?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Just don't make me go to any... foul-smelling places.

default.title: Dispatch Completion
default.text: If I told you I brought some "perfume ingredients" back, would you help me carry them?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Hmm, this should be considered a masterpiece.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Would you like a fragrance tailored just for you?
